author: Erik ABRANSON
content:
… and that is how covid19 reached the Last Place on Earth ðŸ˜‰
This rescue reminds me of when a scientific expedition in 1969, of which I was a member, had to be rescued off uninhabited East Island, in the Crozet archipelago, after having our camp and helicopter detroyed and supplies blown out to sea by a wind that sent the anemometer of our meteorologist way off scale. We survived on penguin meat, Kerguelen cabbage and a barrel of excellent French Navy issue plonk ðŸ˜€ The rescue vessel had to come from Durban…

author: Peter Wright
content:
A great seaboat, worked on her in the North Sea in the 80s.

Hope all are OK.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: I must have been a bit crowded/cozy with all those unexpected guests in the lighthouse.
